features: Parchment Paper and Envelopes Set: This assortment of 48 cream-colored typewriter paper sheets and 48 corresponding envelopes combines functionality with sophistication making it the ideal choice for nearly any occasion

Perfect for Parties: This elegant letter paper and envelopes set is ideal for creating customized party invitations for birthdays, weddings, holidays, corporate events, banquets, and baby bridal showers

Versatile: These professional fountain pen stationery paper sheets can be used for arts and crafts projects, a resume, wedding invitations, certificates, poetry scrolls, medieval-looking documents, love letters, letters to a pen pal, calligraphy, and personalized signs

Printer-Friendly: The vintage-style design and texture of our ivory letter writing paper is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers; perfect for creating custom logos and designs for craft projects, flyers, itineraries, and Christmas party invites
Dimensions: Each sheet of blank unlined fancy letter paper in our resume paper and envelopes set measures 8.5 x 11 inches
body.description: Add this set of 48 vintage-style stationery paper for writing letters and 48 envelopes to your home crafting station. Our fancy stationery paper and envelopes set features luxury paper with a vintage design in a cream color that you can easily write and customize with colored pens or markers. This parchment stationery paper and envelopes set is perfect for creating maps, certificates, poetry scrolls, vintage-inspired documents, and menus to add to your arts and crafts supplies. You can also use them to write letters to Santa or make baby showers, anniversary, and wedding invitations. Each writing paper stationery sheet is laser and inkjet printer-friendly, so you can easily print your personalized letters and party invites. The premium parchment paper for printing measures a standard 8.5 x 11 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, printable
reviews.reviewText: This is nice paper. It has a quality feeling to it and it looks nice too. I couldn't find a cool stationary that I like so I decided to just make my own. It does hold printer ink, but takes a couple of hours to dry or it smudges. The printer ink also looks a bit blotchy, I think because the paper doesn't let the ink bleed like normal paper. You can still get crisp details, as you can see in the picture, but it looks faded. Maybe it would look better with a very high quality printer, I'm not sure.Still, great paper and I will buy it again. I wish there was an option to only buy the paper and not the envelopes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I need
reviews.reviewText: I like the weight of the paper and look of parchment. It was very economical. Well done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressive, truly 'printable' with a great look...
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this set to send a note to friends and family. Hoping to class things up beyond a traditional piece of white printer paper and a business envelope, we went with this. The "antique aged" look is very nice and looks just like it did in the photo. There was also a bit more firmness to each page that elevated it's feel beyond a normal sheet of paper. The envelopes matched the paper exactly and completely fit the paper when tri-folded. I mention this because I have been dismayed when other sets I've purchased don't fit inside perfectly.My biggest concern was that it wouldn't work well with the printer. Sometimes with these types of paper the printer ink bleeds through, comes out a bit wonky, or just doesn't look right. This worked in the printer absolutely perfectly. After it was printed on, it returned to its shape and didn't appear to be run through a printer. You can see in the photo below how clear and flawless it printed. We hand addressed each envelope and the paper was also nice to write on.This is a great set for elevating any note that you are sending to a group of people. It really stands out and looks sharp. Considering the cost of having things done at a print shop, this set is an absolute steal for making an at home project look pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice writing surface, so so appearance.
reviews.reviewText: The stationery takes fountain pen ink nicely. I didn’t realize the color had as mottled an appearance; that’s not evident in sales promotion. I’m getting used to it, but it’s not my ideal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately I needed quiet yet serious looking stationary to use to tell special people about my husband’s death. If one could feel better about stationary used for this purpose then I would say this stationary served the purpose. Paper quality was good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I know this is an old-fashioned way of communicating but I think occasionally it is necessary. The paper is very lovely and I will make good use of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for letter writers!
reviews.reviewText: If you are one of those old-fashioned persons who love to write letters, this is for you. I am one of them. It's good to have some parchment paper on hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice parchment set
reviews.reviewText: Love this light color and they go through the printer just fine.
Just as described. Love the quality. I would have preferred 4 x 6 envelopes but that’s okay.
great quality stationary! used it for my etsy buisness, loved it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Comme je voulais , pas de déception !

reviews.reviewText: I am disappointed in this product, the 48-Count Stationary Paper Letter Set. It doesn't have the substance or texture that I was expecting or hoping for.
